#summary Notes on installation of MythDroid

==MythTV Version==

!MythDroid 0.4 supports MythTV 0.21 - 0.24.

==MythTV Configuration==

You must enable the 'Enable frontend network control' option in each frontend's 
general settings. MDD requires additional configuration steps - see 
[MDDInstall the MDD install guide].

If you're running !MythTV 0.21 see the [021Specific 0.21 specific notes], if 
you're running !MythTV 0.22 see the [022Specific 0.22 specific notes]. If 
you're running any other version, you should be all set.

==Installation==

==== !MythDroid 0.4 ====

Download the latest 
[http://mythdroid.googlecode.com/files/MythDroid-0.4.4.apk MythDroid APK] 
and install using adb (from the Android SDK) or an application from the Market. 
Alternatively check out the latest 0.4 source using subversion URL 
http://mythdroid.googlecode.com/svn/branches/0.4 mythdroid-read-only

==== !MythDroid trunk ====

You can install !MythDroid trunk to your device by checking out the source code 
(via Eclipse with the [http://subclipse.tigris.org/ SubClipse] and 
[http://developer.android.com/sdk/installing.html Android ADT] plugins), 
connecting your device and running !MythDroid on it. The subversion URL for 
trunk is http://mythdroid.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ mythdroid-read-only
